Downtown Center-Leroy St Outbound

Description:

The Downtown Center-Leroy St Outbound leaves campus and travels through Riverside Dr in Johnson City & Binghamton, and Leroy Street in Westside Binghamton enroute to the University Downtown Center.

Operation Time:

Weekdays:
7:00 A.M. to 11:15 P.M. (Fridays) or 11:45 P.M. (Monday-Thursdays)


Weekends:
8:45 A.M. to 11:15 P.M.

Notes:

Scroll below for a graphic map of the Downtown Center-Leroy St Outbound, its schedule, and the stops along its route.

① Leaves the University Union

② Riverside Dr & Columbus Pl

③ Leroy & Murray Streets

④ Arrives at the University Downtown Center


M-T= Only operates Monday-Thursdays.

F= Only operates Fridays.
